DOC.criteria: Mildly hypercholesterolemic : TC < 5.2 < 8mmol/L Age : 2570 BMI : 1932 kg/m2 Haemoglobin : > 125g/L woman 135g/L men Normal liver kidney function Milk , cheese , butter , lactose allergy Drug treatment hyperlipidaemia , hypertension , inflammation hypercoagulation Suffered myocardial infarction/stroke past 12months Diabetic ( diagnose fast glucose > 7 mmol/l ) suffer endocrine disorder Surgery previous 6 month Excessive alcohol consumption ( > 28 unit/wk man ; > 21 unit/wk woman ) Taking vitamin , mineral fatty acid supplement ( e.g . fish oil , calcium ) Pregnant , lactating , plan pregnancy use effective contraceptive precaution Smokers Vegans Anaemic Planning weight reduction scheme Parallel participation another intervention study Participating intensive aerobic activity > 20 minute 3 time per week Use antiinflammatory medication
